speaker: Agent
text: Hello, is this Mr. Johnson? This is Lisa from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Lisa, yes this is Mr. Johnson. I'm doing okay, thanks.

speaker: Agent
text: I’m glad to hear that! I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with XYZ Credit. Can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. I see you have a balance of $350. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: I didn't expect that. Can you give me more details about the charges?

speaker: Agent
text: Of course! This balance is from your last statement dated July 15th. We can discuss how to settle this today.

speaker: Customer
text: I need some time to think about it. Can I call back later?

speaker: Agent
text: Sure, I understand. Just to let you know, you can pay online or through our automated system anytime.

speaker: Customer
text: Alright, I’ll look into that. Thanks for the information.

speaker: Agent
text: You’re welcome, Mr. Johnson. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out.

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate it, Lisa. Talk to you later.
